long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a helper utility for those running Edgemesh Server headless and cached pages (https://edgemesh.com). This utility wraps Edgemesh Server API calls in an easy to use and intuitive interface, and helps a user administer their own cached and headless pages directly from the browser without having to access the Edgemesh customer portal.

The extension provides functionality for Edgemesh Server customers that will help them revalidate page cache, purge page cache and bypass page cache for debugging and update purposes. The extension will also allow a customer to change their Edgemesh Server configuration on the fly, and be able to immediately see these results.

The extension will also allow an Edgemesh Server customer to view their pages current Core Web Vitals as well as Server Vitals, as well as other performance related metrics.

This extension will allow for Edgemesh Server customer developers to easily debug and manage their cached and headless pages, without having to switch to the customer portal repeatedly.
